title: Faith & Patience: The Power Twins
description: Oh Lord, how long? If you've ever asked that question, this book is for you! It will help you learn how to wait . . . without wavering. To persevere in faith (even when you're under pressure) until your victory comes. Discover the conquering combination that can put you over the top every time. Discover Faith and Patience --the Power Twins!
author: Kenneth Copeland
